config.script:
# ** FROM Edit Schedule
	logger = system.util.getLogger('editAttributePopupSave')
	
	#****** OLD LOGIC FROM TABLE *****
	data = {
	    'AttributeID': self.view.custom.AttributeID,
	    'AttributeName': self.view.custom.SelectedAttributeName,
	    'TestAttributeDataTypeID': self.view.custom.TestAttributeDataTypeID,
	    'ValidStartDate': self.view.custom.SelectedValidStartDate,
	    'ValidEndDate': self.view.custom.SelectedValidEndDate,
	    'HiHiLimit': self.view.custom.SelectedHiHiLimit,
	    'HiLimit': self.view.custom.SelectedHiLimit,
	    'TargetValue': self.view.custom.SelectedTargetValue,
	    'LoLimit': self.view.custom.SelectedLoLimit,
	    'LoLoLimit': self.view.custom.SelectedLoLoLimit
	}
	
	# Assign the updated values back to the variables
	AttributeID = data['AttributeID']
	Name = data['AttributeName']
	TestAttributeDataTypeID = data['TestAttributeDataTypeID']
	ValidStartDate = data['ValidStartDate']
	ValidEndDate = data['ValidEndDate']
	HiHiLimit = data['HiHiLimit']
	HiLimit = data['HiLimit']
	TargetValue = data['TargetValue']
	LoLimit = data['LoLimit']
	LoLoLimit = data['LoLoLimit']
	
	try:	
		mes.quality.sp.updateTestAttribute(AttributeID = AttributeID, Name = Name, TestAttributeDataTypeID = TestAttributeDataTypeID, ValidStartDate = ValidStartDate, ValidEndDate = ValidEndDate, HiHiLimit = HiHiLimit, HiLimit = HiLimit, TargetValue = TargetValue, LoLimit = LoLimit, LoLoLimit = LoLoLimit)
		system.perspective.sendMessage("refreshAttributeTable")
		system.perspective.closePopup(self.view.params.ModalName)
		Message = 'Successfully saved attribute values for ID:'+str(AttributeID)
		system.perspective.openPopup('Message', 'GlobalComponents/Modals/ErrorModal', params = {'ErrorMessage':Message, 'ModalName':'Message'}, modal=True)
		
	except Exception as e:
		msg = 'There was an error updating attribute item: ' + str(e)
		system.perspective.print(msg)
		logger.warn(msg)
		system.perspective.openPopup('Message', 'GlobalComponents/Modals/ErrorModal', params = {'ErrorMessage':msg, 'ModalName':'Message'}, modal=True)

DisabledPopup.message: Please sign in as quarterback to proceed.
DisabledPopup.title: Invalid Permissions

	system.perspective.closePopup('')
	system.perspective.openPopup('DeleteTestAttribute', 'App/Quality/AttributeManager/Embedded/Popups/DeleteTestAttribute', params = {'TestAttributeID':TestAttributeID}, modal = True)
